text: @JoeBiden B4 #covid19 I always liked the idea of a family holiday 2 #USA  #flordia with the family . FUK. THAT. THE. PLACE IS BUTT WILD - never ever going to happen . #America is a weirdo .🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿😳
